messages.content: Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
In which U.S. state is Area 51 located?

PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Area_51 dbo:location ?uri . ?uri dbo:country res:United_States. }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who is the mayor of New York City?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:New_York_City dbo:leaderName ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Which U.S. states possess gold minerals?

PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:WikicatStatesOfTheUnitedStates ; dbp:mineral ?mineral FILTER regex(?mineral, "gold", "i") }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who developed Minecraft?
SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Minecraft> <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/developer> ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Where did Hillel Slovak die?
SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Hillel_Slovak> <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/deathPlace> ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Which rivers flow into a German lake?

SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/River> . ?x <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/inflow> ?uri ; a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Lake> ; <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/country> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Germany> }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Which movies star both Liz Taylor and Richard Burton?

SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Elizabeth_Taylor> ; <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Richard_Burton> }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Give me all federal chancellors of Germany.

SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Person> { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/office> "Chancellor of Germany" } UNION { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/property/office> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Chancellor_of_Germany> } }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
To which countries does the Himalayan mountain system extend?
SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Himalayas> <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/country> ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Give me all Australian metalcore bands.

SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Band> ; <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/genre> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Metalcore> { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/hometown> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Australia> } UNION { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/hometown> ?h . ?h <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/country> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Australia> } }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
How many films did Leonardo DiCaprio star in?
SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?uri) AS ?c) WHERE { ?uri a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film> ; <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Leonardo_DiCaprio> }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Give me all libraries established earlier than 1400.
SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Library> ; <http://dbpedia.org/property/established> ?year FILTER ( ?year < 1400 ) }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who has Tom Cruise been married to?
SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/spouse> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Tom_Cruise> }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
How heavy is Jupiter's lightest moon?
SELECT DISTINCT ?n WHERE { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/property/satelliteOf> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Jupiter> ; <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/mass> ?n } ORDER BY ASC(?n) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
What does ICRO stand for?
SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/abbreviation> "ICRO" }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
List the seven kings of Rome.
SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/property/title> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/King_of_Rome> }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who produced films starring Natalie Portman?

SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?film a <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/Film> ; <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Natalie_Portman> ; <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/producer> ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who wrote the book Les Piliers de la terre?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:The_Pillars_of_the_Earth dbo:author ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
How much is the population of mexico city ?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?Mexico_City WHERE { dbr:Mexico_City dbo:populationTotal ?Mexico_City }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
How many people live in Poland?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Poland dbo:populationTotal ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
When was the last episode of the TV series Friends aired?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?date WHERE { dbr:Friends dbo:completionDate ?date }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who was the wife of U.S. president Lincoln?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Abraham_Lincoln dbo:spouse ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Which Indian company has the most employees?

PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Company ; dbo:location res:India ; dbo:numberOfEmployees ?n } ORDER BY DESC(?n) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Which country does the creator of Miffy come from?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Miffy dbo:creator ?x . ?x dbo:nationality ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
When will start the final match of the football world cup 2018?
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT ?Date WHERE { dbr:2018_FIFA_World_Cup dbp:date ?Date } ORDER BY DESC(?Date) LIMIT 1

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
What is the highest mountain in Italy?

PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Mountain ; dbo:locatedInArea res:Italy ; dbo:elevation ?num } ORDER BY DESC(?num) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
What is in a chocolate chip cookie?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Chocolate_chip_cookie dbo:ingredient ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who is the tallest basketball player?

PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:BasketballPlayer ; dbo:height ?num } ORDER BY DESC(?num) OFFSET 0 LIMIT 1

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Did Kaurismäki ever win the Grand Prix at Cannes?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ASK WHERE { res:Aki_Kaurismäki dbo:award <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Grand_Prix_(Cannes_Film_Festival)> }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
How many ethnic groups live in Slovenia?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?uri) AS ?c) WHERE { res:Slovenia dbo:ethnicGroup ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Which television shows were created by Walt Disney?

PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:TelevisionShow ; dbo:creator res:Walt_Disney }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
How much did the Lego Movie cost?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?n WHERE { res:The_Lego_Movie dbo:budget ?n }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who is the host of the BBC Wildlife Specials?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:BBC_Wildlife_Specials dbo:presenter ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Did Socrates influence Aristotle?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ASK WHERE { res:Aristotle dbo:influencedBy res:Socrates }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
In which city does the Chile Route 68 end?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Chile_Route_68 dbo:routeEnd ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Did Elvis Presley have children?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ASK WHERE { res:Elvis_Presley dbo:child ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who was the first to climb Mount Everest?
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Mount_Everest dbo:firstAscentPerson ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Show me Hemingway's autobiography.
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri dbo:author res:Ernest_Hemingway ; dbo:literaryGenre res:Autobiography }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
Who is the founder of Penguin Books?

PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Penguin_Books dbo:founder ?uri }

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
What is the highest mountain in Australia?

PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Mountain ; dbo:locatedInArea res:Australia ; dbo:elevation ?elevation } ORDER BY DESC(?elevation) LIMIT 1

Craft SPARQL queries from October 2016 based on user questions in natural language, exclusively dedicated to extracting information from DBpedia. Your responses should consist solely of SPARQL queries.
In which countries do people speak Japanese?

PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Country ; dbo:language res:Japanese_language }
